title: Cortex Prime character
description: A JSON schema for a Cortex Prime player character sheet.

name.description: The name of the trait set.

description.description: A description of the trait set.

nounSingular.description: The singular noun used to describe a trait in this set.

nounPlural.description: The plural noun used to describe multiple traits in this set.

traits.description: The traits in the trait set.

sfx.description: Any SFX attached directly to this trait set.

value.description: The die value of the trait. For example, `2` for d2, `6` for a d6, etc. For unrated traits, use `0`.

description.description: A description of the trait, or the trait statement.

traits.description: Any child traits attached this parent trait.

sfx.description: Any SFX attached to this trait.

tags.description: A list of taxonomy tags attached to this entity. Tags may include letters, numbers, hyphens, periods, and forward slashes (for namespacing).

custom.description: An open-ended object where apps and services can add custom data to this entity. It is strongly recommended that developers compartmentalize their app’s custom data under a unique key to avoid conflicts and generally be good neighbors.

id.description: A unique identifier for the character.

dateCreated.description: The date and time when the character was first created.

dateModified.description: The date and time when the character was last changed.

dateTouched.description: The date and time when the character was last loaded, viewed or interacted with.

game.description: The name of the game or campaign that the character belongs to.

description.description: A short summary or subtitle for the character.

portrait.description: An image to represent the character.

url.description: A URI compatible with the HTML <image> tag.

plotPoints.description: The character’s current number of plot points.

notes.description: Any additional notes about the character. Format: plaintext, Markdown or HTML.
